p: Early on, there were clues suggesting the link between SARS-CoV and civets, bred for food in China [ 51]. Strengthening the monitoring of these wild animal sources was an important factor in controlling emergence of these virus and their spread in humans. Some scholars advocated that the trading of wild animals in wet markets in Southern China should be banned [ 52]. In fact, the Chinese government had issued bans on rearing, trading, transporting and slaughtering wild animals for dietary purposes over 10 years ago [ 53]. This however, did not stop the practice of illegal trading of wild animals.
